channel.title: Linear Programming on Miguel Biron-Lattes
channel.description: Recent content in Linear Programming on Miguel Biron-Lattes

item.title: Demo for simple payments with linear programming
item.description: I built a webapp that implements the solution for simplifying payments described in my previous post. It is written in Javascript and uses the LALOLib library for linear algebra and solving the linear program.

item.title: Simplifying payments with linear programming
item.description: Update: I have built a demo webapp implementing the solution presented here. You should try it!
